titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Uganda
Uganda

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The National Records and Archives Act of 2001 legislates that important records of research value must be deposited with the national archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: P.O.Box 7048 Kampala A new National Archives Building is currently being built.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to diplomatic records while the National Archives are being built. Pre-independence records may be found at the UK National Archives.
